name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: This records identifiers associated with this care plan that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

name: $addidentifier
desc: This records identifiers associated with this care plan that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: This records identifiers associated with this care plan that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

name: $status
desc: Returns: Indicates whether the goal has been reached and is still considered relevant.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates whether the goal has been reached and is still considered relevant.

name: $category
desc: Returns: Indicates a category the goal falls within.

name: $addcategory
desc: Indicates a category the goal falls within.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates a category the goal falls within.

name: $priority
desc: Returns: Identifies the mutually agreed level of importance associated with reaching/sustaining the goal.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the mutually agreed level of importance associated with reaching/sustaining the goal.

name: $description
desc: Returns: Human-readable and/or coded description of a specific desired objective of care, such as "control blood pressure" or "negotiate an obstacle course" or "dance with child at wedding".

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Human-readable and/or coded description of a specific desired objective of care, such as "control blood pressure" or "negotiate an obstacle course" or "dance with child at wedding".

name: $subject
desc: Returns: Identifies the patient, group or organization for whom the goal is being established.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the patient, group or organization for whom the goal is being established.

name: $target
desc: Returns: Indicates what should be done by when.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates what should be done by when.

name: $statusDate
desc: Returns: Identifies when the current status.  I.e. When initially created, when achieved, when cancelled, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies when the current status.  I.e. When initially created, when achieved, when cancelled, etc.

name: $statusReason
desc: Returns: Captures the reason for the current status.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Captures the reason for the current status.

name: $expressedBy
desc: Returns: Indicates whose goal this is - patient goal, practitioner goal, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates whose goal this is - patient goal, practitioner goal, etc.

name: $addresses
desc: Returns: The identified conditions and other health record elements that are intended to be addressed by the goal.

name: $addaddresses
desc: The identified conditions and other health record elements that are intended to be addressed by the goal.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The identified conditions and other health record elements that are intended to be addressed by the goal.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Any comments related to the goal.

name: $addnote
desc: Any comments related to the goal.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Any comments related to the goal.

name: $outcomeCode
desc: Returns: Identifies the change (or lack of change) at the point when the status of the goal is assessed.

name: $addoutcomeCode
desc: Identifies the change (or lack of change) at the point when the status of the goal is assessed.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies the change (or lack of change) at the point when the status of the goal is assessed.

name: $outcomeReference
desc: Returns: Details of what's changed (or not changed).

name: $addoutcomeReference
desc: Details of what's changed (or not changed).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Details of what's changed (or not changed).
